University of Modena and Reggio Emilia: The University of Modena and Reggio Emilia (Italian: Universit√† degli Studi di Modena e Reggio Emilia), located in Modena and Reggio Emilia, Emilia-Romagna, Italy, is one of the oldest universities in Italy, founded in 1175, with a population of 20,000 students.
